article_title: Bodies of killed foreign aid workers will be taken to Egypt.
sentence: Bodies  of  killed  foreign  aid  workers  will  be  taken  to  Egypt.

article_title: Bodies of killed foreign aid workers will be taken to Egypt.
sentence: An  official  in  the  Hamas-run  Ministry  of  Health  told  the  BBC  that  an  official  funeral  will  be  held  in  honour  of  the  friends  of  the  people  who  were  killed  by  the  Israeli  occupation,  in  what  it  called  "a  complete  crime".
